description: Mu turere twiganjemo Malariya abana baba bugarijwe kurusha abandi.
title: Mu turere twiganjemo Malariya abana baba bugarijwe kurusha abandi.
content:
Mu turere twiganjemo Malariya abana baba bugarijwe kurusha abandi. Igihe
cyose umwana ate umuriro agomba kujyanwa ku mujyanama w’ubuzima 
cyangwa kwa muganga kugirango asuzumwe, avurwe hakiri kare.
Iyo umwana ate umuriro, yanga kurya, ahitwa, aruka, ndetse yacitse intege 
agomba kujyanwa kwa muganga, cyangwa ku mujyanama w’ubuzima kuko 
ashobora kuba yarwaye malariya. Umwana urwaye malariya agomba kuran-
giza imiti, n’iyo indwara yahita ikira. Iyo atarangije imiti, malariya ishobora 
gukara bikagora kuyivura.
